schema: {"type": "record", "name": "CrimeData", "fields": [{"name": "ID", "type": "string"}, {"name": "CaseNumber", "type": "string"}, {"name": "Date", "type": "string"}, {"name": "Block", "type": "string"}, {"name": "IUCR", "type": "string"}, {"name": "PrimaryType", "type": "string"}, {"name": "Description", "type": "string"}, {"name": "LocationDescription", "type": ["null", "string"]}, {"name": "Arrest", "type": ["null", "boolean"], "default": null}, {"name": "Domestic", "type": ["null", "boolean"], "default": null}, {"name": "Beat", "type": ["null", "int"], "default": null}, {"name": "District", "type": ["null", "int"], "default": null}, {"name": "Ward", "type": ["null", "int"], "default": null}, {"name": "CommunityArea", "type": ["null", "int"], "default": null}, {"name": "FBICode", "type": "string"}, {"name": "XCoordinate", "type": ["null", "double"], "default": null}, {"name": "YCoordinate", "type": ["null", "double"], "default": null}, {"name": "Year", "type": ["null", "int"], "default": null}, {"name": "UpdatedOn", "type": "string"}, {"name": "Latitude", "type": ["null", "double"], "default": null}, {"name": "Longitude", "type": ["null", "double"], "default": null}, {"name": "Location", "type": ["null", "string"]}]}
